# Felinids
Small and mischievous cat-eared people. Being small in itself has lots of upsides and downsides. They can hide inside duffelbags.
## Diet
- Can eat raw meat. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- [color=#1e90ff]They are smaller than Humans, making them harder to hit.[/color] - Can fit in duffelbags. - Have the ability to throw up an hairball to get rid of some of the chemicals from their bloodstream. - Able to eat mice and rats after picking them up. This has the benefit of regenerating the hairball ability and feeding them. - Uses their claws to do [color=red]Slashing[/color] damage and [color=red]Piercing[/color] damage. - Can walk completely silently, but only while barefooted. - Immunity to the OwOnavirus disease.
## Drawbacks
- [color=#ffa500]Takes 15% more Blunt, Slash and Piercing damage.[/color] - [color=red]Are easily shoved, pushed and carried around by every other morphotype due to their small size.[/color] - They are weaker and struggle to carry and pull things due to their small size. They are unable to carry an Oni. - They have slightly less stamina than Humans.
